Metadata.title: Dardanova | Global Focused Mobile and Web Solutions
Metadata.description: Dardanova is a technology consultancy company that provides modern software solutions. We are a team of passionate experienced software engineers and designers who are passionate about creating high-quality software products.

Home.title: Global Focused Mobile and Web Solutions
Home.description: We deliver scalable mobile and web solutions from concept to launch, accelerating your global success.

servicesDescriptions.web: We develop modern and scalable web applications. We provide high-performance solutions with Next.js, React, and other modern technologies.
servicesDescriptions.mobile: We develop native applications for iOS, Android, and Windows. We help you reach a wider audience with cross-platform solutions.
servicesDescriptions.mvp: We quickly bring your ideas to life. We enable market testing with Minimum Viable Products and prototypes.
servicesDescriptions.maintenance: We optimize your existing systems, make performance improvements, and provide 24/7 technical support.

innovative.title: Innovative & Smart Solutions
innovative.description: We develop intelligent and future-proof software solutions tailored to your business needs using the latest technologies. Our innovative approach ensures flexibility, efficiency, and seamless integration, empowering you to stay ahead in the digital world.

scalable.title: Scalable & Reliable Infrastructure
scalable.description: We build secure, high-performance infrastructures designed to scale with your business. Our solutions ensure reliability, seamless operations, and the flexibility to adapt to growing demands, providing a solid foundation for long-term success.

customer.title: Customer-Centric Approach
customer.description: We prioritize your needs at every stage of development, crafting tailored solutions that align with your goals. Our customer-focused approach ensures seamless collaboration, continuous support, and a commitment to delivering real value for your business.

development.title: Fast & Efficient Development Process
development.description: With our streamlined workflows and agile methodologies, we deliver high-quality solutions on time without compromising performance. Our efficient development process ensures rapid deployment, continuous improvement, and adaptability to evolving business needs.

difference.question: What sets Dardanova apart from other agencies?
difference.answer: Dardanova combines startup agility with corporate experience while providing end-to-end solutions in mobile, desktop, and web. We design every step in collaboration with you, from rapid prototyping to scalable architectures.

technologies.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
technologies.answer:
• Mobile: React Native, Flutter, Swift, Kotlin
• Web: Next.js, React, TypeScript
• Desktop: Electron
• Cloud & DevOps: AWS, GCP, Azure, CI/CD integrations

process.question: How do you start a project?
process.answer:
1. Discovery & Needs Analysis
2. Technical and UX Consulting
3. MVP Prototype Development
4. Testing & Improvement
5. Launch and Maintenance Processes

timeline.question: How long do project deliveries take?
timeline.answer: It varies by project scope; a small MVP can be completed in 4-6 weeks, while comprehensive solutions may take 3-6 months. We share the exact timeline after the needs analysis.

pricing.question: How do you handle pricing?
pricing.answer:
• Hourly consulting - based on needs and duration
• Project-based fixed fee - based on scope and delivery date
• Long-term maintenance & support subscription - in monthly packages

support.question: What do your support and maintenance services include?
support.answer:
• Code updates
• Performance and security optimization
• 24/7 emergency support (additional package)
• New feature addition and version upgrades

international.question: Do you serve international clients?
international.answer: Yes. We manage projects in English and Turkish, developing multilingual applications suitable for the global market. We offer flexible working hours, taking time zone differences into account for communication.

Footer.description: Global Focused Mobile and Web Solutions
Footer.address: Ferko Signature Plaza, Esentepe, Büyükdere Cd. No:175 A Blok, 34394 Şişli/İstanbul

About.title: About Us
About.paragraph1: Founded in 2019, Dardanova started its journey with a team of experts graduated from Turkey's leading universities (Boğaziçi, Koç, İTÜ). Since our establishment, we have developed products that have reached thousands of users in both local and global markets. In this adventure that we started as a small team, we now offer solutions serving millions of users worldwide.
About.paragraph2: We design MVPs from scratch based on our customers' ideas; we keep your product up to date at all times with launch, update, SEO work, and uninterrupted maintenance processes. By lightening your technical team's workload, we use the most modern mobile, web, and desktop technologies, providing end-to-end support throughout the process.
About.paragraph3: Our 7-person team, which closely follows the industry, has gained experience in many different fields, from fintech to healthcare applications, from e-commerce to corporate software. We analyze your target audience correctly and take your product one step further with user-focused UI/UX design and scalable architectures.
About.paragraph4: As Dardanova, we are with you at every step from idea to launch, and beyond.
